doc.repnme: Commercial bank risk management : training handbook
doc.abstracts: This handbook was prepared by the author to serve as a support material for training of trainers programs in market-based banking and finance organized by EDI (Economic Development Institute) for the Republics of the former Soviet Union. It focuses on management of the following risk areas by banks operating in a market economy, credit risks, industry risk, interest rate risk, foreign exchange risk, and country risk. This handbook also review types and terms of loans, basic credit policies and procedures, and loan classification, provision for loan losses, and managing problem loans.
